subtitles.xx: //[DIANA]\\//(0,7)\\Good evening, 47. Your target is Philo Newcombe, a wedding planner whose C. V. reads like a Shakespearean tragedy. While his job is to make dream weddings reality, he’s not in the business of fairytale endings. When one half of a couple catches his eye, Newcombe will ingratiate himself with them. Then during the course of his work he will covertly murder their partner to clear the way for his romantic overtures. Our client was once the subject of Newcombe’s infatuation, and lost the love of her life as a result. Having some suspicions, she’s followed Newcombe’s career closely ever since and noticed a pattern of ill-fated lovers emerging in his wake. When she heard he’d been retained by a couple planning a destination wedding in Argentina, she contacted us about putting an end to Newcombe’s sanguine love stories. Good luck, 47.
subtitles.en: //[DIANA]\\//(2.45,4.5)\\Good evening, 47.//(4.5,7.19)\\Your target is Philo Newcombe,//(7.19,12.05)\\a wedding planner whose C. V. reads like a Shakespearean tragedy.//(12.05,19.05)\\While his job is to make dream weddings reality, he is not in the business of fairytale endings.//(19.88,25.6)\\When one half of a couple catches his eye, Newcombe will ingratiate himself with them.//(25.6,32.6)\\Then during the course of his work he will covertly murder their partner to clear the way for his romantic overtures.//(32.95,39.45)\\Our client was once the subject of Newcombe's infatuation, and lost the love of her life as a result.//(39.45,44.3)\\Having some suspicions, she's followed Newcombe's career closely ever since//(44.3,48.85)\\and noticed a pattern of ill-fated lovers emerging in his wake.//(48.85,53.65)\\When she heard he'd been hired by a couple planning a destination wedding in Argentina,//(53.65,59.45)\\she contacted us about putting an end to Newcombe's sanguine love stories.//(59.45,66.45)\\Good luck, 47.
subtitles.fr: //[DIANA]\\//(2.45,4.5)\\Bonsoir, 47.//(4.5,7.19)\\Votre cible est Philo Newcombe,//(7.19,12.05)\\un organisateur de mariages au CV digne des tragédies shakespeariennes.//(12.05,15.7)\\Bien que son travail soit de transformer des mariages rêvés en réalité,//(15.7,19.75)\\il ne garantit pas que ceux-ci finiront en conte de fées.//(19.75,25.65)\\Si l'un des mariés attire son attention, Newcombe fera tout pour s'en attirer les faveurs,//(25.65,32.65)\\avant d'assassiner secrètement son ou sa partenaire pour pouvoir flirter librement.//(33.2,39.5)\\Notre cliente a elle aussi été victime du jeu de Newcombe, dans lequel elle a perdu l'amour de sa vie.//(39.5,44.25)\\Suspicieuse, elle a alors analysé en détail l'intégralité de sa carrière,//(44.25,48.85)\\et remarqué qu'il avait laissé une série d'amants malchanceux dans son sillage.//(48.85,53.7)\\En apprenant qu'il venait d'être engagé par un couple souhaitant se marier en Argentine,//(53.7,59.45)\\elle nous a contactés pour nous demander de mettre fin aux romances sanglantes de ce tue-l'amour.//(59.45,66.45)\\Bonne chance, 47.
subtitles.it: //[DIANA]\\//(2.45,4.5)\\Buonasera, 47.//(4.5,7.19)\\Il tuo bersaglio è Philo Newcombe,//(7.19,12.05)\\un organizzatore di matrimoni con un curriculum degno di una tragedia shakespeariana.//(12.05,15.7)\\Il suo lavoro sarebbe quello di organizzare matrimoni da favola,//(15.7,19.75)\\ma i lieto fine non sono il suo forte.//(19.75,25.65)\\Se qualcuno in una coppia attira la sua attenzione, Newcombe non esita a provare di ingraziarselo.//(25.65,32.65)\\A metà dell'ingaggio, si premura poi di assassinare l'altro partner per rendersi più facile il corteggiamento.//(33.2,39.5)\\La nostra cliente è stata un tempo oggetto dell'infatuazione di Newcombe, e come risultato ha perso l'amore della sua vita.//(39.5,44.25)\\Ha sempre sospettato di Newcombe e quindi ha continuato a tenere d'occhio la sua carriera,//(44.25,48.85)\\finendo per notare la scia di amori tragici che quest'uomo si lascia alle spalle.//(48.85,53.7)\\Quando ha scoperto che Newcombe era stato ingaggiato da una coppia per organizzare un matrimonio esotico in Argentina,//(53.7,59.45)\\ci ha contattati per mettere fine alle sue sanguinose storie d'amore.//(59.45,66.45)\\Buona fortuna, 47.
subtitles.de: //[DIANA]\\//(2.45,4.5)\\Guten Abend, 47.//(4.5,7.19)\\Ihr Ziel ist Philo Newcombe,//(7.19,12.05)\\ein Hochzeitsplaner, dessen Lebenslauf sich wie eine Shakespeare-Tragödie liest.//(12.05,13.45)\\Seine Aufgabe ist es zwar,//(13.45,15.45)\\Traumhochzeiten wahr werden zu lassen,//(15.45,19.95)\\aber märchenhafte Enden scheinen nicht sein Fall zu sein.//(19.95,22.85)\\Wenn ihm die eine Hälfte eines Paares auffällt,//(22.85,25.45)\\versucht er, sich bei ihr einzuschmeicheln.//(25.45,29.65)\\Anschließend ermordet er im Zuge seiner Arbeit insgeheim den anderen Partner,//(29.65,33.45)\\um freie Bahn für eigene romantische Avancen zu haben.//(33.45,36.855)\\Unsere Klientin war selbst Ziel von Newcombes Verliebtheit//(36.855,38.65)\\und verlor deshalb die große Liebe ihres Lebens.//(39.8,41.15)\\Da sie misstrauisch geworden war,//(41.15,44.45)\\begann sie im Nachgang, Newcombes Laufbahn genauer zu verfolgen –//(44.45,47.95)\\und bemerkte, dass er eine Spur von Liebespaaren mit unermesslich viel Pech//(47.95,49.25)\\in seinem Fahrwasser hinterließ.//(49.25,51.15)\\Als sie hörte, dass ihn ein Paar angeworben hat,//(51.15,53.65)\\das in Argentinien heiraten will,//(53.65,54.95)\\kontaktierte sie uns,//(54.95,58.95)\\damit wir Newcombes blutrünstigen Liebesgeschichten ein Ende machen.//(59.75,66.75)\\Viel Glück, 47.
subtitles.es: //[DIANA]\\//(2.45,4.5)\\Buenas noches, 47.//(4.5,7.19)\\Tu objetivo es Philo Newcombe,//(7.19,12.15)\\un organizador de bodas que tiene en su currículo más tragedia que una obra de Shakespeare.//(12.15,19.15)\\Aunque su trabajo es hacer bodas de ensueño, no está en el negocio por los finales felices.//(19.95,25.25)\\Cuando le llama la atención alguna de las futuras contrayentes, Newcombe se congracia con ella.//(25.55,29.85)\\Luego, mientras desempeña su oficio, asesina disimuladamente a su pareja//(29.85,33.75)\\para tener el camino expedito y tirarle los tejos.//(36.25,39.15)\\Nuestra cliente fue una vez objeto del capricho de Newcombe y, por su culpa, perdió al amor de su vida.//(39.45,44.25)\\Como se olía algo, empezó a seguir de cerca la carrera profesional del organizador//(44.25,48.8)\\y descubrió la estela de desdichadas amantes que Newcombe iba dejando a su paso.//(49.05,54.05)\\Cuando se enteró de que lo había contratado una pareja para que le organizara una boda de destino en Argentina,//(54.05,58.55)\\se puso en contacto con nosotros para poner fin a las sanguinarias historias de amor de Newcombe.//(59.55,66.55)\\Buena suerte, 47.
subtitles.ru: //[DIANA]\\//(2.45,4.5)\\Добрый вечер, 47-й.//(4.5,8.08)\\Твоя цель — Филон Ньюкомб, организатор свадеб,//(8.08,11.105)\\чье резюме напоминает шекспировскую трагедию.//(12.235,13.08)\\Он обещает исполнить любые свадебные мечты,//(13.08,19.18)\\но счастливый финал — это не по его части.//(19.56,25.98)\\Если ему приглянулся кто-нибудь из молодоженов, Ньюкомб втирается в доверие.//(25.98,29.85)\\Выполняя заказ, он в какой-то момент убивает вторую половинку,//(29.85,33.34)\\чтобы устроить романтическую авантюру.//(33.34,36.82)\\Наша клиентка стала жертвой увлечения Ньюкомба//(36.82,39.78)\\и утратила любовь всей жизни.//(39.78,42.55)\\Чтобы подтвердить подозрения, она начала внимательно следить//(42.55,44.75)\\за карьерой Ньюкомба и увидела,//(44.75,49.15)\\что за ним тянется целая цепочка погибших молодоженов.//(49.15,54.06)\\Узнав, что его наняли организовать выездную свадьбу в Аргентине,//(54.06,56.45)\\она связалась с нами и попросила положить конец//(56.45,58.61)\\кровавым любовным аферам Ньюкомба.//(59.67,66.67)\\Удачи, 47-й.
subtitles.cn: //[DIANA]\\//(2.45,4.5)\\晚上好，47。//(4.5,7.19)\\你的目标是菲洛·纽科姆，//(7.19,12.05)\\此人是一名婚礼策划师，他的简历读起来就像一部莎士比亚悲剧。//(12.05,15.75)\\尽管他的工作是将顾客的梦幻婚礼变为现实，//(15.75,19.88)\\但他的真正意图却并非替他人制造童话般的结局。//(19.88,25.65)\\每当有一位新人入了他的眼，纽科姆便会对其大献殷勤。//(25.65,32.65)\\然后，他会在工作期间谋杀其伴侣，以便为自己的猎艳之旅扫清道路。//(32.95,39.45)\\我们的客户曾是纽科姆所迷恋的猎物，并因而失去了她一生的挚爱。//(39.45,44.3)\\觉得事有蹊跷的她，从那时起就密切地关注了纽科姆的工作 ——//(44.3,48.85)\\并从中发现一双双的苦命鸳鸯皆出自他经手过后的婚礼。//(48.85,53.95)\\当她听说他被一对新人所聘请，前去策划其在阿根廷的旅行婚礼，//(53.95,59.45)\\她联系到我们，希望能够阻止纽科姆再次续写这篇沾满血污的爱情悲剧。//(59.45,65)\\祝你好运，47。
subtitles.tc: //[DIANA]\\//(2.45,4.5)\\晚上好，47。//(4.5,7.19)\\你的目標是斐洛・紐康姆，//(7.19,12.05)\\此人是一名婚禮策劃師，他的簡歷讀起來就像一部莎士比亞悲劇。//(12.05,15.75)\\雖然他的工作是將顧客夢中的婚禮變為現實，//(15.75,19.88)\\但他的真正意圖卻並非替他人製造童話般的結局。//(19.88,25.65)\\每當有一位新人吸引到他的目光了，紐康姆便會對其大獻殷勤。//(25.65,32.65)\\然後，他會在工作期間謀殺其伴侶，藉此為自己的獵豔之旅掃清道路。//(32.95,39.45)\\我們的客戶以前便是紐康姆所迷戀的獵物，並因而失去了她一生的摯愛。//(39.45,44.3)\\認為事有蹊蹺的她，從那時起就密切地關注了紐康姆的工作 ——//(44.3,48.85)\\並由此發現一雙又一雙的苦命鴛鴦皆出自他經手過後的婚禮。//(48.85,53.95)\\當她聽說他被一對新人所聘請，前去策劃其在阿根廷的旅行婚禮，//(53.95,59.45)\\她聯繫到我們，希望能夠給紐康姆手上這篇沾滿血污的愛情悲劇畫上句號。//(59.45,65)\\祝你好運，47。
subtitles.jp: //[DIANA]\\//(2.45,4.5)\\こんばんは、47。//(4.5,6.89)\\ターゲットは、ファイロ・ニューカム。//(6.89,12.04)\\シェイクスピアの悲劇のような経歴を持つウェディングプランナーよ。//(12.04,15.47)\\夢のウェディングを実現させるのが仕事なのに、//(15.47,19.58)\\彼自身はおとぎ話のようなハッピーエンドを望まないみたい。//(19.58,25.505)\\気に入った相手を見つけると、そのカップルに取り入るのよ。//(25.505,32.505)\\そして仕事の途中でその人のパートナーを殺して、自分の交際の邪魔にならないようにするの。//(33.06,39.54)\\クライアントは、かつてニューカムに気に入られてしまい、運命の相手を失った女性よ。//(39.54,44.34)\\不審感を抱いた彼女は、その後ニューカムの動向を注視していて、//(44.34,48.93)\\ニューカムが関わったカップルに悲劇が起きていることに気づいた。//(48.93,53.705)\\アルゼンチンで海外挙式を行うカップルを担当することを聞き、//(53.705,58.685)\\ニューカムの血塗られたラブストーリーに終止符を打つためにコンタクトを取ってきたわ。//(59.73,66.73)\\幸運を祈るわ、47。
